message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. I think this is a great price considering its value and uniqueness.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I believe $10000 would be a fair price for me. I look forward to your response.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a fair price, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11000. I think this is a great compromise considering the product's value and uniqueness.
